com.mindfusion.scheduling

Class CellSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.ViewSettings
      • com.mindfusion.scheduling.CellSettings

  • public final class CellSettings
extends ViewSettings
    Defines appearance settings for the cells representing time ranges in the calendar.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the string used to format and display the first day of each month in the calendar.

      Gets the appearance style used to paint calendar elements that don't have a distinct style assigned to them.

      Gets the color used to paint the line that marks the current cell.

      Gets the color used to fill the header of the current cell.

        public void setHeaderPosition(Position value)

      • getHeaderSize

        public java.lang.Integer getHeaderSize()
        Description copied from class: CellSettings
        Gets the size of the cell header in pixels.

        This property specifies the height of the header if CellSettings.getHeaderPosition() is either Top or Bottom, or the width of the header if CellSettings.getHeaderPosition() is Left or Right. Specifying 0 for this property expands the header to fill the entire cell.

        Returns:
        A non-negative integer value specifying the size in pixels.

      • setHeaderSize

        public void setHeaderSize(java.lang.Integer value)
        Description copied from class: CellSettings
        Sets the size of the cell header in pixels.

        This property specifies the height of the header if CellSettings.getHeaderPosition() is either Top or Bottom, or the width of the header if CellSettings.getHeaderPosition() is Left or Right. Specifying 0 for this property expands the header to fill the entire cell.

        Parameters:
        value - A non-negative integer value specifying the size in pixels. Set to null to use the corresponding value from the current theme.

      • getShowToday

        public java.lang.Boolean getShowToday()
        Description copied from class: CellSettings
        Gets a value indicating whether the calendar should mark the current cell by underlining the header area.
        Returns:
        true to indicate visually the current day; otherwise, false.

      • setShowToday
